entities.name: zonko's
entities.description: Zonko's is a store where Harry needs to buy Stink Pellets.

entities.name: stink pellets
entities.description: Stink Pellets are a product that Harry needs to buy from Zonko's.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who wants to visit Zonko's and buy Stink Pellets.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who suggests asking McGonagall for permission to go to Hogsmeade.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend who tries to dissuade him from going to Hogsmeade.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts who has the authority to grant permission for students to go to Hogsmeade.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is a person who has been sighted and is being pursued by Harry.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is a location where students are allowed to go on weekends.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is Hermione's cat who jumps onto her lap.

relationships.description: Harry wants to visit Zonko's to buy Stink Pellets.
Ron suggests asking McGonagall for permission to go to Hogsmeade.
Hermione tries to dissuade Harry from going to Hogsmeade.
McGonagall has the authority to grant permission for Harry to go to Hogsmeade.
